cms.query.QueryText:
SELECT ##TOPN## ##COLUMNS## FROM ( SELECT q.[QueryID], q.[QueryName], c.[ClassName] + '.' + q.[QueryName] AS [QueryFullName], q.[QueryTypeID], q.[QueryText], q.[QueryRequiresTransaction], q.[ClassID], q.[QueryIsLocked], q.[QueryLastModified], q.[QueryGUID], q.[QueryIsCustom], q.[QueryConnectionString] FROM [CMS_Query] q INNER JOIN [CMS_Class] c ON q.[ClassID] = c.[ClassID] WHERE q.[ClassID] IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT 0 AS [QueryID], 'selectall' AS [QueryName], c.[ClassName] + '.selectall' AS [QueryFullName], 0 AS [QueryTypeID], 'SELECT NULL' AS [QueryText], 0 AS [QueryRequiresTransaction], c.[ClassID] AS [ClassID], 0 AS [QueryIsLocked], GETDATE() AS [QueryLastModified], '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' AS [QueryGUID], 0 AS [QueryIsCustom], c.[ClassConnectionString] AS [QueryConnectionString] FROM [CMS_Class] c WHERE c.[ClassIsCoupledClass] = 1 AND c.[ClassID] NOT IN (SELECT [ClassID] FROM [CMS_Query] WHERE [QueryName] = 'selectall' AND [ClassID] IS NOT NULL) ) t WHERE ##WHERE## ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##
